project.name: MapComplete Open Climbing Map
project.description: On this map you will find various climbing opportunities such as climbing gyms, bouldering halls and rocks in nature

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Climbing Map has a layer Climbing club showing features with this tag

Layer 'Climbing club' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')
Layer 'Climbing club' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')
Layer 'Climbing club' shows contact:website~.+ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:website}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')
Layer 'Climbing club' shows and asks freeform values for key 'email' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing club' shows and asks freeform values for key 'opening_hours' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing club' shows access=yes with a fixed text, namely 'Publicly accessible to anyone' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if access~.+|)

Layer 'Climbing club' shows access=permit with a fixed text, namely 'You need a permit to access here' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if access~.+|)

Layer 'Climbing club' shows access=customers with a fixed text, namely 'Only customers' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if access~.+|)

Layer 'Climbing club' shows access=members with a fixed text, namely 'Only club members' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if access~.+|)

Layer 'Climbing club' shows access=no with a fixed text, namely 'Not accessible' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if access~.+|)
Layer 'Climbing club' shows values with key 'access:description' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')
The MapComplete theme Open Climbing Map has a layer Climbing gyms showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Open Climbing Map has a layer Climbing gyms showing features with this tag

The layer 'Climbing gyms allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

Layer 'Climbing gyms' shows service:rental:climbing_shoes=no with a fixed text, namely 'Climbing shoes can not be rented here' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing opportunities' shows climbing=boulder with a fixed text, namely 'A climbing boulder - a single rock or cliff with one or a few climbing routes which can be climbed safely without rope' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing opportunities' shows climbing=crag with a fixed text, namely 'A climbing crag - a single rock or cliff with at least a few climbing routes' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing opportunities' shows climbing=area with a fixed text, namely 'A climbing area with one or more climbing crags and/or boulders' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map')

Layer 'Climbing opportunities' shows and asks freeform values for key 'rock' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Climbing Map') (This is only shown if climbing=crag|natural=cliff|natural=bare_rock)
